name: munki Chef cookbook
readme:
# munki Cookbook

1. Downloads the latest official munki release from https://github.com/munki/munki/releases
2. Installs it.
3. Configures a munki repo based on the wiki getting start guide https://github.com/munki/munki/wiki/Demonstration-Setup

The cookbook does a basic check to confirm if you are running munki on Mac OS X "workstation" or Mac OS X "server" and
will start apache if Mac OS X "server" is not setup.

### Platforms

- Tested on Mac OS X 10.11.6 workstation and with Server 5.1.7 

### Chef

- Chef 12.0 or later

### Cookbooks

- `munki` - with no addtional cookbook dependencies but I'd suggest you look at better ways to manage the httpd.conf file as I use a brute force method.

## Contributing

Happy to take contributions. My first cookbook so its a little basic.
